NetCoMi: Network Comparison for Microbial Compositional Data

NetCoMi-package.Rd

NetCoMi offers functions for constructing, analyzing, and comparing microbial association networks as well as dissimilarity-based networks for compositional data. It also includes a function for constructing differential association networks.

The main functions are netConstruct, netAnalyze, netCompare, and diffnet

See also

Useful links:

  • https://stefpeschel.github.io/NetCoMi/
